fields.text: Thank you for calling Figure Eight in San Francisco, where we make AI work in the real world.
To speak with our sales team about AI solutions and pricing, press [INDEX].
For pricing details and package options, press [INDEX].
Please hold, and we will connect you to a pricing specialist shortly.
To schedule a personalized product demonstration, press [INDEX].
Please hold, and we will connect you to a demo coordinator shortly.
To reach our support department, press [INDEX].
For technical support and troubleshooting, press [INDEX].
Please hold, and we will connect you to a technical support specialist shortly.
For account management and billing inquiries, press [INDEX].
Please hold, and we will connect you to our billing team shortly.
